mission.title: ission
mission.desc: HairCoSys empowers everyone in different life stages with healthy hair by democratizing hair and scalp check-ups through big data analytics and artificial intelligence, easy-to-use mobile apps, and public education on the concept of hair loss prevention.

strength.title: trength
strength.carddesc1: Symptoms of hair and scalp identified by our proprietary algorithms
strength.carddesc2: Photos of hair and scalp labelled by hair professionals for machine learning
strength.carddesc3: Years of hair care experience of HairAgain to support our professional diagnosis

product.title: roduct
product.desc2: technology provided by us, the hair care and hairstyling industry are propelled into the digital age
product.card1desc: Check your hair condition all in a smartphone. The HairCoSys APP will tell you
product.card2desc: With the A.I. technology provided by HairCoSys, you can providing more value-added services to clients

whoweare.herodesc: HairCoSys is formed by a team of passionate entrepreneurs and experienced data scientists. As a startup company, we successfully entered a 3-year incubation programme sponsored by the Hong Kong Science and Technology Park in 2022.

news.title: HairCoSys showcases AI innovation at 2022 Hong Kong ICT Expo
news.desc: HairCoSys is showcasing our AI innovations to solve hair loss problems at the 2022 Hong Kong ICT Expo. Since joining the HKSTP Incubation programme, we have been using valuable data captured in the last 20+ years from their experienced partners and leverage haircare domain knowledge to build diagnostic models now and predictive models in the near future for hair loss. Besides meeting many old and new friends, we are glad that our demonstration on the A.I. scalp diagnostic has become one of the visitors’ favourite things to do at the ICT Expo!

news.title: Summer Internship Program
news.desc: As our 2022 summer internship program comes to an end, we’re sending a big thank you to all of our interns with a lunch party. Our smart and dynamic tech team has been helping them develop knowledge and skills in A.I., machine learning, mobile app development and big data analysis. We thank everyone for being a part of the HairCoSys family this summer and it was a pleasure having you all.

news.title: HairCoSys enters Hong Kong Science and Technology Park!
news.desc: We are pleased to announce the opening of HairCoSys Limited @HKSTP - Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corporation! HairCoSys is dedicated to building an ecosystem for the hair care and hair beauty industry with the use of A.I. and Big Data. During the opening ceremony, Michael Wong the founder & CEO shared his vision to solve hair loss problems through A.I.-haircare expert collaboration. Please stay tuned for regular updates on our A.I. research and technology development!

hero.herotitle: Jump Start Your Career in Artificial Intelligence with HairCoSys

card.title: “Small Team, Big Impact”
card.desc: you will be an invaluable member of our flexible and agile team. You won’t be put in a box and be exposed to a wide range of new technology as our business grows.

card.title: Disrupting the industry
card.desc: You will work on our innovative projects to reform the haircare/beauty-related industry and propel them to the digital era with artificial intelligence.

card.title: Fast-paced career development
card.desc: You will start your fulfilling and fascinating career in the innovation and technology sector, becoming a pro, and turn your ideas into reality.

contact.desc: Please send your full resume with your current and expected salary to mail@haircosys.com.
